words can't express my gratitude

I'm a fan of prison movies,gangster movies and noir movies in general so I had to rip all that I could find and yes,I like french noirs too.Stay tuned,other movies from these genres will be uploaded in the near future.
Looks interesting, and the IMDB link leads to 'THX 1138' :)
